personal_information.name: Piotr Samol
personal_information.about_me: 6 years of experience scientist and self-taught programmer. During the master's degree and abroad research project learned how to solve problems as well as develop analytical and creative thinking. An honest, ambitious, open-minded person, eager to learn new things. Also, have good interpersonal and communication skills which are profitably used in teamwork. Strong skills in Python, FastAPI, Flask, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, Pandas, and Selenium.
